meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the myrtle family.
meanings.sent1: The eugenia plant in our garden has beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I learned about eugenia plants in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The eugenia plant tried to hide behind the rose bush, but its flowers gave it away.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening bloomed like a eugenia plant in full spring.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the eugenia plant filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.sent1: Eugenia is excited to celebrate her birthday next week.
meanings.sent2: I met a kind lady named Eugenia at the park.
meanings.sent3: Eugenia giggled when she heard her name in a funny accent.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was as striking as the name Eugenia itself.
meanings.sent5: Eugenia's smile lit up the room like a beacon of joy.
